name: @jytesh/keyv-test-suite
description: Test suite for Keyv API compliancy

scripts.release:major: npm test && npm version major -m "chore: release" && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm version minor -m "chore: release" && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm version patch -m "chore: release" && git push origin master --tags && npm publish

author: Luke Childs <lukechilds123@gmail.com> (http://lukechilds.co.uk)
